CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether University relative to Nova Institute?
SRP.A: Aether University is {above} Nova Institute in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Foundation relative to Echo Research?
SRP.A: Crimson Foundation is {above} Echo Research in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Research relative to Aether University?
SRP.A: Echo Research is {below} Aether University in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total research grants awarded?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Foundation}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total research grants awarded?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Echo Research}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aether University's minimum Research Grants Awarded in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aether University's minimum Research Grants Awarded is in {1991}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Foundation's minimum Research Grants Awarded in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Foundation's minimum Research Grants Awarded is in {1992}.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1995, was the average total Research Grants Awarded higher or lower than between 1990 and 1996?
NC.A: The average total research grants awarded between 1991 and 1995 was {higher} than between 1990 and 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1994, was the average total Research Grants Awarded higher or lower than between 1994 and 1996?
NC.A: The average total research grants awarded between 1992 and 1994 was {higher} than between 1994 and 1996.

NC.Q: Was the total Research Grants Awarded in 1989 higher or lower than in 1993?
NC.A: The total research grants awarded in 1989 was {higher} than in 1993.

NC.Q: Was the total Research Grants Awarded in 1989 higher or lower than in 1994?
NC.A: The total research grants awarded in 1989 was {higher} than in 1994.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Crimson Foundation} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Echo Research and Aether University first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Echo Research and Aether University first exchanged leading positions in {1990}.
